attributes.action: Discontinue the use of tungsten filament bulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Typically 30% of your domestic electricity bill is spent on lighting your home. Approximately 90% of the electricity used to power regular light bulbs is lost to heat. The use of energy saving light bulbs can help to reduce the typical domestic electricity bill by producing the same amount of light as a standard light bulb but by using a fraction of the electricity. This "new" technology means that energy saving light bulbs can outlive standard light bulbs by 8 times!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
